title: Evidence-Based Simulation Training for Strengthening Genetic Expert Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic genetics theory and clinical application experience
context.additional_context: Requires team leadership roles as a manager and the ability to analyze real-world case studies

learning_goals: Diagnostic recommendations can be provided with 90% accuracy by applying genomic analysis results to clinical scenarios
Genetic counseling skills between patients and medical staff achieve 3.5+ points on a 4-point evaluation criteria (communication, ethics, etc.) in VR simulation environments
Leadership roles are performed during team-based genetic case studies, facilitating participation from over 80% of team members
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
